title: Composites 101: The Fundamentals
description: An introductory course on the fundamentals of composite materials, from theory to practical application.
author: Dr. Evelyn Reed
whatYouWillLearn: The fundamental principles of composite materials.
Different types of fibers and resins and their properties.
The most common manufacturing processes for composites.
How to design and analyze a simple composite structure.
The importance of quality control in composites manufacturing.
Safety procedures for handling composite materials.
Real-world applications of composites in various industries.
whatYouWillBuild: You will design and create a small composite part, such as a phone case or a drone propeller, from scratch. This project will take you through the entire process, from material selection and mold design to layup, curing, and finishing.
